text:
Amazon QuickSight Q brings machine learning-powered
natural language query capability to QuickSight

enabling business users to ask questions about their data in
plain English and get answers in seconds

QuickSight Q uses machine learning models to understand
the meaning and relationship of the business data

across multiple sources, allowing customers to
ask questions and get answers immediately

without waiting for weeks of data modeling
and dashboard developments

To get started asking questions,
you simply enter your question in the Q search bar

As you begin typing your question,
Q provides spell-check and auto-complete suggestions

so you don’t have to worry about typos or
remember the exact terms
Q extracts the business terminologies, and intent from questions
as well as the corresponding data from the source
Then, Q returns the answer in the appropriate visual chart
Q continuously improves its accuracy by learning from users
For example, when Q doesn’t understand a phrase in a question

it prompts users to select from a drop-down menu of suggested
options in the search bar and remembers the phrase for next time

Q is optimized to understand complex business
language and data models from multiple domains

including Sales, Marketing and Retail as well as HR, Advertising,
Financial Services, and Healthcare, amongst others
To learn more about Amazon QuickSight Q
